sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' const TodoItem = ({ text, completed, onComplete }) => ( [{completed ? 'x' : ' '}] {text} ) const Wrapper = styled.p` font-size: 24px; cursor: pointer; ` const Text = styled.span` text-decoration: ${props => (props.completed ? 'line-through' : 'none')}; ` export default TodoItem
